Job Title : Machine Learning Engineer
Job Overview

We're searching for a passionate and skilled Machine Learning Engineer to join our growing team and help us push the boundaries of what's possible with AI. You'll be responsible for the entire machine learning lifecycle, from designing and developing innovative algorithms to deploying and monitoring them in production. You'll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects that directly impact our core business and millions of users.

Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and implement machine learning models for various use cases, including but not limited to:
Recommendation systems
Natural language processing
Computer vision
Fraud detection
Anomaly detection
...and more!
Conduct data analysis and feature engineering to prepare data for model training.
Experiment with different algorithms and architectures to optimize model performance.
Build and maintain robust production-grade machine learning pipelines.
Monitor and evaluate model performance in production, identifying and addressing any issues proactively.
Collaborate with data scientists, software engineers, product managers, and other stakeholders to ensure successful integration of machine learning solutions.
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field of machine learning and contribute to knowledge sharing within the team.
Document your work clearly and concisely for future reference and team understanding.
Qualifications:

Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
3+ years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or related role.
Proven experience building and deploying machine learning models in production.
Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms and statistical concepts.
Proficiency in programming languages like Python and R.
Experience with machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, etc.
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure for model deployment.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
A passion for machine learning and a desire to make a real impact with your work.
Bonus points:

Experience with deep learning architectures and NLP models.
Knowledge of distributed computing and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
Experience with MLOps practices and tools.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
What We Offer:

The opportunity to work on challenging and impactful projects that directly benefit millions of users.
A collaborative and supportive work environment where you'll learn from and grow with other talented engineers.
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Flexible work arrangements and remote-friendly culture.
The chance to make a real difference in the world through the power of machine learning.
If you're ready to take your machine learning skills to the next level and join a team that's passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI, we encourage you to apply!
